div.p: CONTESTEDBEHAVIOUR is located in BIOGRAPHY EDUCATION . It records instances of significant actions or behaviour in school which was frowned on. This element particularly tracks young women's rebelliousness in the face of restrictive educational institutions.It is to be placed around the complete sentence(s) describing the behaviour.

div.codeblock: <CONTESTEDBEHAVIOUR>Asked in 1914 to write an essay on patriotism, she produced a stinging indictment of Britain and the King.</CONTESTEDBEHAVIOUR>
